Text: Live in Paris (Diana Krall album):  The DVD video was filmed during Krall's sold-out concert at Paris's Olympia on November 29 - December 2, 2001 and includes songs from her multi-platinum albums "Only Trust Your Heart", "", "When I Look in Your Eyes" and "The Look of Love".
